title: Far Cry Playthrough -- Part 2
description: This game was great until the very very end, and it went on a little too long.  Overall enjoyed it though.

Far Cry 2 starts off amazing, but the constantly instantly respawning checkpoints becomes tedious, as you cannot just run/drive past. They have rubber banding and always catch up.
You have to drive everywhere via roads, there's limited fast travel points via a few bus terminals. And every time you go anywhere for any mission, you'll pass multiple checkpoints on the road
and they will shoot you to pieces if you don't stop to kill them
